title: Customized Instructional Design Process Through Digital Learning Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and work experience in social sector roles
context.additional_context: Process aimed at strengthening social-sector job competencies for working professionals, applying data-driven decision-making methods in mobile-based microlearning environments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose individual strengths and weaknesses by analyzing learning data collected from digital platforms
Learners can design personalized learning paths based on analytical results
Learners can develop and present case studies applying data-driven instructional design through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
